title: Monthly Business Survey - Retail Sales Index

introduction.description: The information supplied is used to produce monthly estimates of the total retail sales in Great Britain where retailing is defined as the sale of goods to the general public for household consumption. The Retail Sales Index is a key indicator of the progress of the economy. It is also used to help estimate consumer spending on retail goods and the output of the retail sector, both of which feed into the compilation of the National Accounts. The results are also used by the Bank of England and HM Treasury to inform decision making by government and in formulating financial policies. The results are published on our website.

questions.title: What are the dates of the sales period you are reporting for?
questions.description: If possible, this should be for the period 3rd April 2016 to 30th April 2016.

messages.INVALID_DATE: The date entered is not valid.  Please correct your answer.
The date entered is not valid.  Please correct your answer.

sections.title: Commodities - Retail Turnover
sections.description:
- You should enter figures for the reporting period stated above
- You should round your figures to the nearest (£) pound

Include

  • VAT
  • Internet Sales

responses.label: What was the value of the business's total sales of food?
responses.guidance:
Include

  • all fresh food
  • other food for human consumption (except chocolate and sugar confectionery)
  • soft drinks

Exclude

  • sales from catering facilities used by customers

messages.NOT_INTEGER: Please only enter whole numbers into the field.
messages.NEGATIVE_INTEGER: The value cannot be negative. Please correct your answer.
messages.INTEGER_TOO_LARGE: The maximum value allowed is 9999999999. Please correct your answer.

responses.label: What was the value of the business's total sales of alcohol, confectionery and tobacco?
responses.guidance:
Include

  • alcoholic drink
  • chocolate and sugar confectionery
  • tobacco and smokers’ requisites

messages.NOT_INTEGER: Please only enter whole numbers into the field.
messages.NEGATIVE_INTEGER: The value cannot be negative. Please correct your answer.
messages.INTEGER_TOO_LARGE: The maximum value allowed is 9999999999. Please correct your answer.

responses.label: What was the value of the business's total sales of clothing and footwear?
responses.guidance:
Include

  • clothing and footwear
  • clothing fabrics
  • haberdashery and furs
  • leather and travel goods
  • handbags
  • umbrellas

messages.NOT_INTEGER: Please only enter whole numbers into the field.
messages.NEGATIVE_INTEGER: The value cannot be negative. Please correct your answer.
messages.INTEGER_TOO_LARGE: The maximum value allowed is 9999999999. Please correct your answer.

responses.label: What was the value of the business's total sales of household goods?
responses.guidance:
Include

  • carpets, rugs and other floor coverings
  • furniture
  • household textiles and soft furnishings
  • prints and picture frames
  • antiques and works of art
  • domestic electrical and gas appliances, audio/visual equipment and home computers
  • lighting and minor electrical supplies
  • records, compact discs, audio and video tapes
  • musical instruments and goods
  • decorators’ and DIY supplies
  • lawn-mowers
  • hardware
  • china, glassware and cutlery
  • novelties, souvenirs and gifts
  • e-cigarettes

messages.NOT_INTEGER: Please only enter whole numbers into the field.
messages.NEGATIVE_INTEGER: The value cannot be negative. Please correct your answer.
messages.INTEGER_TOO_LARGE: The maximum value allowed is 9999999999. Please correct your answer.

responses.label: What was the value of the business’s total sales of other goods?
responses.guidance:
Include

  • toiletries and medications (except NHS receipts)
  • newspapers and periodicals
  • books, stationery and office supplies
  • photographic and optical goods
  • spectacles, contact lenses and sunglasses
  • toys and games
  • cycles and cycle accessories
  • sport and camping equipment
  • jewellery
  • silverware and plate, clocks and watches
  • household cleaning products and kitchen paper products
  • pets, pets’ requisites and pet foods
  • cut flowers, plants, seeds and other garden sundries
  • other new and second hand goods
  • Mobile phones

Exclude

  • revenue from mobile phone network commission and top up
  • lottery sales and commission from lottery sales
  • sales of car accessories and motor vehicles
  • NHS receipts

messages.NOT_INTEGER: Please only enter whole numbers into the field.
messages.NEGATIVE_INTEGER: The value cannot be negative. Please correct your answer.
messages.INTEGER_TOO_LARGE: The maximum value allowed is 9999999999. Please correct your answer.

responses.label: What was the value of the business’s total retail turnover?
responses.guidance:
Include

  • VAT
  • internet sales
  • retail sale from outlets in Great Britain to customers abroad

Exclude

  • revenue from mobile phone network commission and top up
  • sales from catering facilities used by customers
  • lottery sales and commission from lottery sales
  • sales of car accessories and motor vehicles
  • NHS receipts

messages.MANDATORY: Please provide a value, even if your value is 0.
messages.NOT_INTEGER: Please only enter whole numbers into the field.
messages.NEGATIVE_INTEGER: The value cannot be negative. Please correct your answer.
messages.INTEGER_TOO_LARGE: The maximum value allowed is 9999999999. Please correct your answer.

responses.label: Of your total retail turnover, how much were from internet sales?
responses.guidance:
Include

  • VAT
  • sales from orders received over the internet, irrespective of the payment or delivery method

messages.NOT_INTEGER: Please only enter whole numbers into the field.
messages.NEGATIVE_INTEGER: The value cannot be negative. Please correct your answer.
messages.INTEGER_TOO_LARGE: The maximum value allowed is 9999999999. Please correct your answer.

responses.label: What was the value of the business’s total sales of automotive fuel?
responses.guidance:
Include

  • VAT
  • sales of fuel owned by you
  • sales of other items not paid a commission for

Exclude

  • sales of fuel not owned by you
  • any commisions

messages.NOT_INTEGER: Please only enter whole numbers into the field.
messages.NEGATIVE_INTEGER: The value cannot be negative. Please correct your answer.
messages.INTEGER_TOO_LARGE: The maximum value allowed is 9999999999. Please correct your answer.

sections.title: On 12 January 2016 what was the number of employees for the business named above?
sections.description: An employee is anyone aged 16 years or over that your organisation directly pays from its payroll(s), in return for carrying out a full-time or part-time job or being on a training scheme.

responses.label: Please explain any movements in your data e.g. sale held, branches opened or sold, extreme weather, or temporary closure of shop
